scripts.setup: npm i && ts-patch install && npm run build
scripts.setup.all: npm run setup && cd ../demo && npm i && cd ../demo-angular && npm i
scripts.clean: npm run clean.src && npm run clean.standard && npm run demo.reset && npm run demo-angular.reset && npm run setup
scripts.debug.demo-angular.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && ns debug android --emulator
scripts.debug.demo-angular.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && ns debug ios --emulator
scripts.demo-angular.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && ns run android --emulator
scripts.demo-angular.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && ns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo-angular.ios.ci: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && ns build ios --env.uglify
scripts.demo-angular.ios.min: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && ns run ios --env.uglify --emulator
scripts.demo.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && ns run android --emulator
scripts.demo.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && ns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo.ios.ci: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && ns build ios --env.uglify
scripts.demo.ios.min: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && ns run ios --env.uglify --emulator
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && ns plugin remove nativescript-stripe && ns install && ns plugin add ../src && cd ../demo-angular && ns plugin remove nativescript-stripe && ns install && ns plugin add ../src
scripts.test.android: npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && ns build android && ns test android --justlaunch && cd ../demo-angular && ns build android && ns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && ns build ios && ns test ios --justlaunch && cd ../demo-angular && ns build ios && ns test ios --justlaunch
